comments:
If create a project with same name but different case in Eclipse you will get 
an error message on creation and exceptions in log when press finish button in 
Project wizard.
Will be nice if the project with same name (& different case) will be detected 
and error will be displayed on Project wizard label (as ghappen when the name 
is the same and same case) and Next/Finish button should be disabled.

Steps:
1. Create a Java project named a
2. Try to create another java project named A
Actual: when press Finish button you get an error message and exceptions in log 
(see below)

See below the error log:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.jdt.ui 4 10001 Dec 22, 2004 15:45:08.818
!MESSAGE Internal Error
!STACK 1
org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.ResourceException: A resource exists with a 
different case: /iii.
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Resource.checkDoesNotExist
(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Project.create(Unknown Source)
	at 
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.wizards.buildpaths.BuildPathsBlock.createProject
(Unknown Source)
	at 
org.eclipse.jdt.ui.wizards.JavaCapabilityConfigurationPage.createProject
(Unknown Source)
	at 
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.wizards.JavaProjectWizardSecondPage.updateProject
(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.wizards.JavaProjectWizardSecondPage$1.run
(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.WorkspaceModifyDelegatingOperation.execute
(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.WorkspaceModifyOperation$1.run(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.WorkspaceModifyOperation.run(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run
(Unknown Source)
!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.core.resources 4 275 Dec 22, 2004 15:45:08.828
!MESSAGE A resource exists with a different case: /a.

Resource core doesn't offer API to find out if a project of a certain name (or
resource in general) can be created. We therefore can't warn users in the wizard
 but have to let them run into a error dialog.

We did some workarounds in the case of the new package or new type wizard, but
for projects we can't as the New project wizard also would accept existing
locations.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 76954 ***

traces.message: A resource exists with a  different case: /iii.
